Lazio has put a 150 million euro price tag on Sergej Milinkovic-Savic. [Di Marzio]

Real Madrid willing to satisfy the Lazio president's demands to bring the player to Spain. Juventus and Manchester United are not possible to complete with that fee.

Juventus focused on keeping Pjanic and made first offer for CSKA's Golovin. [Di Marzio]

The bianconeri are now determined to turn down any offers for Pjanic, they also would like to extend his contract to ensure he’s building block for the future.

Initial offer from Juventus for Golovin is worth 17 million plus bonus, but that is not enough to satisfy their demand, as CSKA is asking for 25 million euros. The Bianconeri directors are working on a counter offer worth 18 million euros with a percentage on the future sale.

Atalanta, interest for Juventus' Mandragora


Rolando Mandragora start again in Serie A and could do so with Atalanta, who is the latest squad to show interest in the Italy and Juventus midfielder. Mandragora would find Gasperini at Atalanta, who is the manager that gave him his debut at Genoa. The move could be concluded in a positive manner with the midfielder reuniting with his first teacher.

https://gianlucadimarzio.com/en/atalanta-interest-for-juventus-mandragora

Juventus focused on keeping Pjanic: the situation


After two strong seasons in Turin, Miralem Pjanic has become a key player for Allegri at Juventus. The bianconeri are now determined to turn down any offers for the former Roma midfielder, they also would like to extend Pjanic’s contract to ensure he’s building block for the future. Despite interest from abroad, Juventus want to keep Pjanic

https://gianlucadimarzio.com/en/juventus-focused-on-keeping-pjanic-the-situation
alciomercato report that Gianluigi Buffon wants to aim high and see out his career with Paris Saint-Germain, accepting their offer of a two-year deal.

Juventus, Emre Can expected to undergo medical visits between Thursday and Friday


It seems like Emre Can's adventure with Juventus will finally begin. The ex-Liverpool man is expected in Italy between Thursday or Friday to undergo his medical visits at J Medical in Turin. He is ready to begin his experience in Italy after playing in the Bundesliga (with Bayer Leverkusen) and the Premier League.

Barcelona have joined the race to sign Man Utd transfer target Sergej Milinkovic-Savic from Lazio, reports La Repubblica.

The highly rated Serbian midfielder is one of the hottest properties in European football, having also attracted interest from Juventus, and is rated £120m by his current club.

However, Barca may tempt the Serie A side into a deal by offering Rafinha as a makeweight.

隨著葡萄牙1-2不敵烏拉圭，C.朗拿度離開了世界盃的舞台。不過，C.朗拿度並沒有就此淡出球壇的視野，意甲霸主祖雲達斯在這個時候開始運作挖角C.朗拿度的驚天轉會。
　　據《拖連奴體育報》報導，祖記正在同C.朗拿度的經理人文迪斯一同運作挖角C.朗拿度的轉會。《拖連奴體育報》在週日的頭版曝出祖記挖角C.朗拿度的消息。報導中稱，C.朗拿度已經萌生離開皇馬的想法，皇馬方面也不再堅守C.朗拿度高達10億歐元的解約金條款；另一方面，皇馬拒絕C.朗拿度開出的4,000萬歐元年薪的加薪要求，只願意給他加薪至3,000萬歐元/年，這也加深他離開皇馬的想法。

　　《拖連奴體育報》稱，雖然此前C.朗拿度的經理人文迪斯同祖記關係緊張，但隨著這位球壇大鱷成功把旗下大將簡斯路運作至祖記，雙方的關係已經緩和，他們也開始著手嘗試運作C.朗拿度的轉會。報導中特別提到，祖記老闆阿涅利家族擁有挖角C.朗拿度的雄厚財力。

　　據《拖連奴體育報》報導，祖記正在同C.朗拿度的經理人文迪斯一同運作挖角C.朗拿度的轉會。《拖連奴體育報》在週日的頭版曝出祖記挖角C.朗拿度的消息。報導中稱，C.朗拿度已經萌生離開皇馬的想法，皇馬方面也不再堅守C.朗拿度高達10億歐元的解約金條款；另一方面，皇馬拒絕C.朗拿度開出的4,000萬歐元年薪的加薪要求，只願意給他加薪至3,000萬歐元/年，這也加深他離開皇馬的想法。

　　《拖連奴體育報》稱，雖然此前C.朗拿度的經理人文迪斯同祖記關係緊張，但隨著這位球壇大鱷成功把旗下大將簡斯路運作至祖記，雙方的關係已經緩和，他們也開始著手嘗試運作C.朗拿度的轉會。報導中特別提到，祖記老闆阿涅利家族擁有挖角C.朗拿度的雄厚財力。

According to Sky Sport Italia transfer journalist Gianluca Di Marzio, Cristiano Ronaldo has expressed his willingness to play for Juventus.

Reports have been gathering all day from across the Spanish press, then in Portugal where A bola and O Jogo reported that Ronaldo is angling for a move to Turin this summer.

Di Marzio now reports that Ronaldo’s agent Jorge Mendes, who also represents new Juve signee Joao Cancelo, invited the Bianconeri to make an offer for CR7.

According to the report, Juve are giving serious thought about signing the Portuguese forward and the €120m transfer fee is not a stumbling block for the club.

Ronaldo is asking for €30m net per year and Juve President Andrea Agnelli will need to decide whether or not to make the investment.

Tuttosport and others have gone so far as to suggest the club may incorporate FIAT sponsorship deals into Ronaldo’s contract as a way of balancing the books.

Asked earlier about the prospect of signing Cristiano Ronaldo, Juve director Beppe Marotta responded that the story was “a suggestion,” rather than issuing a denial.

Goal Italia, Correire Torino, Marca, AS and a number of other outlets are also reporting the deal.

Jugones report Real Madrid have accepted Juve bid for Cristiano

According to the director of the daily sports show Josep Pedrerol, the Portuguese striker is set for a move to Turin set to earn a sum of 30 million euro per year.

According to Spanish daily sports programme Jugones, Real Madrid have decided to sell Cristiano Ronaldo to Juventus. Presenter of the show Josep Pedrerol affirmed that the LaLiga club are set to accept a 100 million euro offer from the Serie A side for the striker they purchased from Manchester United for a fee of 96 million in 2009.

According to Jugones the Madeira born striker will earn a similar salary as he does with the Santiago Bernabeu outfit but the decision to move to the Italian league is fueled by the desire the Portuguese striker has for a new environment and fresh challenge.

Jugones report that the now 33-year-old player deems his cycle in Madrid to have come to an end and indeed was acutely aware of the interest from the Old Lady of Italian football before the 2017/18 Kiev Champions League final. The striker now hopes that Real Madrid won't stand in his way of a move to Italy and according to Jugones, Real Madrid appear prepared to go along with the move which will see Cristiano wear the famous black and white striped shirt next season in Serie A.

C.朗拿度從小有個祖記夢？曾自曝:兒時夢想為祖記踢球
2018年07月05日00:35






C.朗拿度曾自曝夢想為祖記踢球

　　近日，C.朗拿度和祖記之間的轉會傳聞佔據了各大體育媒體的頭版頭條，C.朗拿度到底會不會去祖記？各大媒體和皇馬的球迷都在猜測著，而從C.朗拿度在今年4月時的一個采伐中，我們也能看出一些端倪，當時C.朗拿度表示自己小時候曾夢想著為祖記踢球。
　　在今年4月，C.朗拿度在皇馬同祖記的比賽中上演了驚世倒掛，並最終幫助皇馬淘汰祖記晉級，並一路拿下歐冠盃冠軍。在當時接受採訪時C.朗拿度曾表示：「這是我今晚經歷的最美妙的時刻之一，球場內的球迷像歡迎祖記一樣給我鼓掌。能夠得到這樣一支有著眾多優秀球員球會的球迷為我鼓掌，對我來說是至高的榮譽。」
　　


C.朗拿度贏得祖記球迷掌聲的倒掛射門

　　「我感到非常開心，也非常激動，因為當我還是個小男孩的時候，祖記就一直是我非常鍾愛的球隊。他們為我鼓掌的瞬間，會永遠留在我的心裡。」


報導截圖

　　「我感謝今晚在場的所有祖記球迷，感謝你們。謝謝！」
